configuration.name: Flutter Doctor: Warning: Fix: cmdline-tools component is missing (Flutter config & ANDROID_HOME)

option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: flutter config --android-sdk "$HOME/Library/Android/sdk" && cd $HOME && export ANDROID_HOME="$HOME/Library/Android/sdk" && grep -qxF 'export ANDROID_HOME="$HOME/Library/Android/sdk"' .zshrc || echo 'export ANDROID_HOME="$HOME/Library/Android/sdk"' >> .zshrc && open .zshrc && echo $ANDROID_HOME
